attributes.action: Give all care assistants in the HSC and NHS a pay rise!
attributes.additional_details: Earlier in the year some members of the health service were given a pay rise, but a lot of issues arised on social media when they found out that care assistants and care workers were not getting a pay rise, they are also on the front line doing more of a job than teachers who got a pay rise!!
attributes.background: Don’t you think that care assistants deserve a pay rise, Boris Johnson has given doctors pay rises what about care assistants! They are doing incredible jobs putting lives at risks working with covid patients and working sometimes 7 days a week, sometimes more that doctors do.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313488

You may also like to sign this petition:
